page.title: 13Day in My Life - Parent
page.content:
... Monday July 15th 1985 ...
I woke up late (8.26am) - we got back late from a trip to Wales the day before so we slept late. The children had cereal for breakfast and rushed to school.
I stripped the beds and washed bedding in automatic washer and dryer. Had to defrost the freezer. There were still puddles on the floor when the kids came home for lunch. To take away the boredom of these jobs, I listened to a Christian children's tape to learn new songs for Sunday School. One chorus is: "I am God's project I'm his love object I am God's project And God never fails."
